clusterAnnotations.description: Annotations to apply to the cluster

clusterIdentity.description: The SSH key secret reference, auto-populated

name.description: The SSH key secret name, auto-populated

clusterLabels.description: Labels to apply to the cluster

pods.description: The network ranges from which Pod networks are allocated

services.description: The network ranges from which service VIPs are allocated

controlPlaneNumber.description: The number of the control plane pods

extraArgs.description: Map of key-values (strings) for any extra arguments to pass down to Kubernetes api-server process

helm.description: K0s helm repositories and charts configuration

charts.description: The list of helm charts to deploy during cluster bootstrap

repositories.description: The list of Helm repositories for deploying charts during cluster bootstrap

controllerPlaneFlags.description: ControlPlaneFlags allows to configure additional flags for k0s control plane and to override existing ones. The default flags are kept unless they are overriden explicitly. Flags with arguments must be specified as a single string, e.g. --some-flag=argument

apiPort.description: The kubernetes API port. If empty k0smotron will pick it automatically

konnectivityPort.description: The konnectivity port. If empty k0smotron will pick it automatically

type.description: An ingress methods for a service

machines.description: The list of remote machines configurations

address.description: The IP address of the remote machine

args.description: Extra arguments to be passed to k0s worker, see: https://docs.k0sproject.io/stable/worker-node-config/

port.description: The SSH port of the remote machine

provisionJob.description: The kubernetes Job to use to provision the machine

jobSpecTemplate.description: The job template to use to provision the machine, see: https://docs.k0smotron.io/stable/resource-reference/#remotemachinespecprovisionjobjobspectemplate

metadata.description: Standard object's metadata of the jobs created from this template, see: https://docs.k0smotron.io/stable/resource-reference/#remotemachinespecprovisionjobjobspectemplatemetadata

spec.description: Specification of the desired behavior of the job, see: https://docs.k0smotron.io/stable/resource-reference/#remotemachinespecprovisionjobjobspectemplatespec

useSudo.description: Determines whether to use sudo for k0s cluster bootstrap commands

user.description: The user to use when connecting to the remote machine
